name: Coplanar Nations: Yemen Civil War 03|02|237
description:
6000 x 4800px PNG

Using the artifact known as Z-fighting, flags of nations and governments involved in the Yemen Civil War are used to depict the complex and brutal nature of the conflict, which, since 2014 is still ongoing as of the time of minting. The resulting humanitarian crisis has impacted over 20 million people, half of which are children, leaving 2/3 of the country's population at risk of starvation.
